import React from 'react' import {userContext} from '../../context/UserContext' export default function Create() { const { user,setLoad } = React.useContext(userContext); const [name, setName] = React.useState(''); const [code,setCode] = React.useState(''); return (
handleSubmit(e)}>
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" class="form-control" id="inputPassword" />
setCode(e.target.value)} class="form-control" id="inputPassword" />
) }
